metadata.Title: CVE-2018-15834 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In radare2 before 2.9.0, a heap overflow vulnerability exists in theread_module_referenced_functions function in libr/anal/flirt.c via acrafted flirt signature file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-15834` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-5.0.0 - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libradare2-common - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
radare2 - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
